name: Easy Potatoes
author: Sara Hooper

ingredients.name: to 1 stick of margarine or butter

instructions: Fill 9 x 13 glass pan with potatoes, add milk. Slice butter or margarine into pats and lay on top of the potato slices. Sprinkle Lawry's seasoning salt over the potatoes. Bake at 400Â° until potatoes are done, approximately 1 hour.
